text: Herbert Donald Oyler (March 8, 1907 – September 19, 1989) was a Canadian curler. He was the skip of the 1951 Brier Champion team, representing Nova Scotia.http://www.sportnovascotia.ca/hof/Inductees/Search/InducteeDetails/tabid/571/Default.aspx?m=215"Oyler Funeral", Toronto Star, Toronto Star, pg D7 It was the first time a team went undefeated at the Brier.Edmonton Journal, 22 Sept 1989, pg E4, "Funeral service for perfect skip" Oyler did not curl competitively after winning the 1951 due to a sore wrist, which affected his delivery. ==References== Category:Brier champions Category:1908 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Curlers from Nova Scotia Category:People from Kings County, Nova Scotia Category:Canadian male curlers
title: Don Oyler
